description: BoxWave's ClearTouch Ultra: the latest innovation in screen protectors! The ClearTouch Ultra utilizes a special glueless adhesive only along the perimeter of the device, thereby eliminating bubbles entirely. This also makes installation a breeze - the ClearTouch Ultra installs perfectly in mere seconds! The only thing you need to do is correctly line up the cut-outs, and you're done! To remove the ClearTouch Ultra, simply lift from any corner and it comes off clean - no unwanted sticky residue on the screen! Maintaining the superior, industry-recognized quality of our screen protectors, theBoxWave ClearTouch Ultra Anti-Glarecombines the durability you expect with the fail-proof installation you desire.
title: BoxWave ClearTouch Ultra 100% Bubble Free Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" (2012) Premium Anti-Glare Screen Protector - Frame Border, Matte, Anti-Fingerprint, Kindle Fire HD 7" (2012) Anti-Glare Screen Protector, Hassle Free, Easy Installation - Installs in seconds! (Black)
